headline: Vistra Meta Nuclear Deal Adds Long Term Zero Carbon Revenue Visibility
summary: Vistra (NYSE:VST) has signed a 20 year nuclear power purchase agreement with Meta, focused on supplying zero carbon electricity. The contract is designed to provide long term revenue visibility for Vistra while supporting Meta’s data center energy needs. The deal lands at a time when regulatory scrutiny of power generation and reliability is increasing across the sector. For you as an investor, the key point is that Vistra is tying a portion of its future cash flows to a single, long...
